Pokeball.Name: Poke Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon.
Pokeball.Description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.

Pokeball.Name: Great Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon.
Pokeball.Description: A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

Pokeball.Name: Ultra Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon.
Pokeball.Description: An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.

Pokeball.Name: Master Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon without fail.
Pokeball.Description: The best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

Pokeball.Name: Safari Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon in the Safari Zone.
Pokeball.Description: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is recognizable by the camouflage pattern decorating it.

Pokeball.Name: Sport Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon in the Bug-Catching Contest.
Pokeball.Description: A special Poké Ball that is used during the Bug-Catching Contest.

Pokeball.Name: Premiere Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon.
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that was made as a commemorative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.

Pokeball.Name: Cherish Ball
Pokeball.Description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been crafted in order to commemorate a special occasion of some sort.

Pokeball.Name: Park Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Recatches Pokémon sent through Pal Park.
Pokeball.Description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

Pokeball.Name: Dream Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon in the Entree Forest.
Pokeball.Description: A special Poké Ball that appears in your Bag out of nowhere in the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.

Pokeball.Name: Beast Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on Ultra Beasts.
Pokeball.Description: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
